notes.title: Authorsâ€™ Contributions
notes.p: Both authors whose names appear on the submission; made substantial contributions to the conception or design of the work and interpretation of data; drafted the work and revised it critically for important intellectual content; approved the version to be published; and agree to be accountable for all aspects of the work in ensuring that questions related to the accuracy or integrity of any part of the work are appropriately investigated and resolved.
